name: 4x6 Cluster w/ Variable Rest (~12 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 4 sets x ~1 min each + ~2 min rest => ~12 min total
overview_and_execution: At ~75% 1RM, perform 2 reps, rest 10s, 2 reps, rest 20s, 2 reps = 6 total reps per set. Rest 2–3 min, then repeat for 4 sets. Increase load 2.5–5 lbs when you can complete all sets cleanly.
example_application: Barbell Row @ 150 lbs: 2 reps, rest 10s, 2 reps, rest 20s, 2 reps. That’s 1 set of 6. Do 4 sets total. If all 24 reps are strong, bump to 155 lbs next session.
important_notes: Short rests within each set help maintain form while keeping intensity moderate.
